biography: Klaus Bondam got his acting breakthrough in the movie Festen and starred in the series Langt fra Las Vegas as the sexually driven boss Buckingham. He stopped his acting career in 2003. He has been manage two theatres, "Grønnegårds Teatret" (1996–2003) and "Folketeatret" (2003–2005), and been administrative manager of "Mungo Park" theatre (1995–1996).
name: Klaus Bondam
